test_summary: Comprehensive test of imagination system fixes including initialization timing, button removal, and DALL-E-3 model usage

fixes_tested.name: Trigger Imagination Button Removal
fixes_tested.description: Remove the non-working Trigger Imagination button from the GUI

fixes_tested.name: Manual Trigger Function Removal
fixes_tested.description: Remove the _manual_trigger_imagination function that was not working

fixes_tested.name: Imagination System Initialization Timing
fixes_tested.description: Move imagination system initialization to after all required systems are available

fixes_tested.name: DALL-E-3 Model Usage
fixes_tested.description: Verify DALL-E-3 is used for image generation and GPT-4 Vision for analysis

fixes_tested.name: Imagination GUI Integration
fixes_tested.description: Verify imagination GUI is properly integrated into the main interface
